Submodules¶

xaikit.utils module¶

xaikit.utils.append_missing_features(features, n_features)¶

Appends missing features to a list of features.

xaikit.utils.ensure_2d_array(x)¶

Ensures that an array x is two-dimensional.

xaikit.utils.get_predictor(estimator)¶

Returns a predict or predict_proba function of an estimator.

Parameters

estimator – An instance of scikit-learn Estimator.

xaikit.utils.get_values(x)¶

Returns x.values for a pandas DataFrame, or x itself if it’s already a numpy array.
